abilities.description: (PASSIVE)MIRROR IMAGEWhen LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.
abilities.name: MIRROR IMAGEW

abilities.description: (Q)SIGIL OF MALICELeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.
abilities.name: SIGIL OF MALICEL

abilities.description: (W)DISTORTIONLeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.
abilities.name: DISTORTIONL

abilities.description: (E)ETHEREAL CHAINSLeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.
abilities.name: ETHEREAL CHAINSL

abilities.description: (R)MIMICLeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.
abilities.name: MIMICL
